original: Knudsen, Kolbjörn, skådespelare, Göteborg, f. 13/10/97 i Bergen, Norge, av kvarning. Niels K. o. h. h. f. Langeland. G. 24 m. Asta Thorssell. Barn: Leif f. 28. — Elev v. Lorensbergstea-tern 19-21, iskådesp. där 22-26, v. Kon-serthusteätern 26-27, Dramat, teatern 27-32, åter v. Lorensbergsteatern 32-35, v. Gbgs stadsteater sed. 35. Bl. roll.: Pompejus i Antonius o. Kleopat-ra, Hippolytus i Fedra, Sam Evens i Sällsamt mellanspel, Essex i Elisabeth av Engl., Helge i Johan Ulfstjerna, Ti-tus i Rembrandt, Steve Crandell i Broadway, Gregers Verle i Vildanden, titelr. i Gösta Berling, Carl XH i Drabanter, Lennie i Möss o. människor, Ferrers i Vibrationer, Den okände i Till Damaskus Hl, Feer Gynt, Onkel Vanja, Jean i Fröken Julie, Othello, Garcin i Slutna dörrar. Anders de Wahl-stip. 29. Hobby: trädg :iskötsel.
translated: Knudsen, Kolbjörn, actor, Gothenburg, b. 13/10/97 in Bergen, Norway, son of Kvarning. Son of Niels K. and his wife from Langeland. Married on 24th of the month, with Asta Thorssell. Children: Leif, b. 28. — Student at Lorensbergsteatern 19-21, actor there 22-26, at Konserthusteatern 26-27, at Dramaten 27-32, back at Lorensbergsteatern 32-35, at Gothenburg City Theatre since 35. Notable roles: Pompeius in Antony and Cleopatra, Hippolytus in Phaedra, Sam Evens in A Curious Interlude, Essex in Elizabeth of England, Helge in Johan Ulfstjerna, Titus in Rembrandt, Steve Crandell in Broadway, Gregers Verle in The Wild Duck, title role in Gösta Berling, Carl XH in Drabanter, Lennie in Of Mice and Men, Ferrers in Vibrations, The Unknown in To Damascus, Peer Gynt, Uncle Vanya, Jean in Miss Julie, Othello, Garcin in No Exit. Anders de Wahl scholarship in 29. Hobby: gardening.
